instruction: Analyze the findings on the performance of European multinational firms during the past decade of tepid growth across Europe and deglobalization.
output: According to the analysis, global European firms were able to weather the decade-plus of tepid growth and trend towards deglobalization. Though it may appear counterintuitive, these firms were able to adapt and thrive in the changing economic landscape. So, despite the risk of regions decoupling, European multinational firms can still remain competitive on a global level.
